title: MaxFun Block Party: Movie Advice with Maximum Film
description:
As part of the celebration of the MaxFun Block Party, we've got a special crossover episode with the folks from Maximum Film discussing the good and EXTREMELY BAD advice from our favorite films.

Check out Ify Nwadiwe, Drea Clark, and Alonso Duralde on Maximum Film! https://maximumfun.org/podcasts/maximum-film
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Alonso Duralde, Drea Clark, Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Ify Nwadiwe)
